website_summaries.verdict: Solar lights that provide adequate ambient illumination. However, they come with some durability issues and battery life fades quickly.
pros: Solar LED units that provide enough light to illuminate the edges of driveways or walkways
Manufacturer offers a lifetime replacement guarantee and helpful customer service
cons: After a few nights, many of the lights are either much more dim or run out of juice

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this set and the lighting is just as good as my low-voltage lights (see photos for comparison)
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set and the lighting is just as good as my low-voltage lights (see photos for comparison). The photo with the two lights are the solar lights. Two photos were taken without the camera flash. Out of the six, I have one light that will not work. I will be contacting the company about it. I"ll update this post later with year.
customer_reviews.author: D.Pintar

customer_reviews.title: Best solar lights ever !!
customer_reviews.text: The best set of solar light ever!! I've ordered different solar packages, but these were packaged excellently with no broken units.The quality is excellent, well made and sturdy. Their customer service is above par with a note from them asking how the units arrived and how I liked them. Excellent customer service. I will be ordering them once again
customer_reviews.author: silvermoonslady

customer_reviews.title: They look really nice. I actually ordered a second box of them ...
customer_reviews.text: They look really nice. I actually ordered a second box of them to finish lining my yard. Wish they were a tiny bit brighter but I am happy with them. I ordered these because of the life time warranty. The company has emailed me twice to make sure I am happy. And I am. Update review. I have one of the lights currently not working. I emailed the only email address I could find for these lights about 5 days ago but no response yet. I will get you in informed on how easily I am able to get the life time guarantee replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i love these lights
customer_reviews.text: I have used several brands of solar lights in the past and these ( at this point ) are super. I'm not sure if this is an option, but the post comes in 2 sections with a coupling which gives you 2 height options . I have these on the walk at church and the short height works best for me. as with other solar lights, I may have to use different batteries.
customer_reviews.author: T M MOORE

customer_reviews.title: Embarrassing to have in front yard!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These lights don't last even 3 hours!!!!!!! They turned on at 8pm and starting to go dim at 11 pm. These don't even last past midnight! My neighbors have the cheap version and look in the picture, you can see how bright theirs are. It's embarrassing having these in front of my house. Get the cheaper version ones on amazon that are half the price. A lifetime warranty doesn't even matter if they don't even work! Extremely disappointed in this product. At least one light is bright.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Really good lights. They are lit from sundown until past midnight, maybe longer but I've not been up to check. The light is white and just the right brightness to show off the walk and accent the flowerbeds. I bought to sets and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Gordon James

customer_reviews.title: Useless warranty.
customer_reviews.text: .. the warranty won’t work .. im still waiting my lights to be replaced .. I bought 4 boxes back in October 2017 and by now Feb 2018 almost half is not working.. which is fine and dandy if the warranty actually worked .😒 Today is March 15th, and I’m still trying to get someone from Amazon to help me ... still no lights.. from my last review I have now more 4 lights off... my question is: how come Amazon lets this vendors that are not trustworthy sell theirs stuff here? I guess Amazon is loosing its credibility, at least for me... they will end up loosing as a costume.
customer_reviews.author: MARCIA G RIBEIRO

customer_reviews.title: Uggh. Fill w rain water.  Only  decorative as they don’t really light a path
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: this are terrible as not sealed so interior regularly fills with water leaving a rust colored liquid. One should not have to empty solar lights. Having a very mild winter here in Oregon I just installed the switch were simply done... But these lights are not very bright at all Lighting is a very blue cold color. I’m really disappointed as these are larger than solar lights I purchased earlier so I expected them to put out more light... They don’t. Some reviews say the lifetime guarantee is false. I hope that’s not the case because these are made in China, and I’m not so sure to their durability since they are brand new
customer_reviews.author: Grandma in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Lighted Path to Hot Tub
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these lights to provide a lighted path to our hot tub. They are bright enough to provide a lighted pathway but not so bright that they detract from our stargazing. The lights were very easy to assemble. The soil here in New Mexico is very hard so my husband used a root feeder attached to the hose to bore a hole before inserting the lights into the ground. This worked very well and the stakes slid in very easily. I have only had these lights a few days now but I am very pleased. This is a great product and I love the guarantee should anything go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Margo J. Halsey

customer_reviews.title: Great disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of these in 2017 hoping that the life time guarantee would mean that they would last longer. Some didn't work right off the bat and so the company sent replacements. Now, one year later and after having replaced all of them with high quality rechargeable batteries (their batteries run out quickly), all but one do not work. Don't waste your money on these. Just buy the cheapest ones possible (since they are all the same) and throw them out when they stop working.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother
customer_reviews.text: I have had these in my backyard for < 2 months and they work sporadically at best!! Two of them don't even light up, one flickers constantly and the fourth one only puts off a small amount of light when it's been really sunny for several days!! I am extremely disappointed, would have had better success with plain old matches or lights from the dollar store!! Watch the video I took the other night, now three of them flicker non-stop!!
customer_reviews.author: G Loves Indy

customer_reviews.title: Fully charged in the nice bright sun whole day but lights lasted 5-10min
customer_reviews.text: Fully charged in the nice bright sun whole day but lights lasted 5-10min. Then I turned off-on couple times and came back, but again, lights lasted less than 5min. I tried 3-4different places to see if it can get better sun light charge but didn't work. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: nahiku

customer_reviews.title: **changed from 4 Stars to 1 Star ***
customer_reviews.text: Changing my review from 4 star to 1 star because 3 have already stopped working, even with brand new batteries.
customer_reviews.author: AndySanders

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality item.
customer_reviews.text: Half stopped working after a few weeks. They only stay lit for a few hours after dark. We hoped to use these at night when the power goes out, but the battery doesn’t last more than 90 minutes and 3 of the 6 don’t work at all anymore. I bought them 2 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: K McDreamy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth thee money...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know, maybe it's me, but, I bought these lights several month ago, and already they have started breaking, not coming on, and just plain not working as they should for the money I paid for them. They are placed far away from any bright dusk/dawn lights. Are far enough apart so they don't inhibit the others. I used to buy the cheapie $.77 ones at Wal-Mart and the lasted longer than these are. Would I recommend these, no just because they aren't a good value for the investment.
customer_reviews.author: juliea1031

customer_reviews.title: Light my Driveway Please!
customer_reviews.text: When they work, these lights look nice. Not super bright but enough to be noticed. They add a nice visual touch to my property. The batteries that came with them don't last very long and don't always work. Also, sometimes the clear plastic cup will fill up with water causing rust. I only started with 5 in the ground so when one got ruined, I just grabbed the remaining light and switched them out. UPDATE: These lights last about a year MAXIMUM and then fail. They either corrode or just stop working for no reason, despite replacing the batteries. I am disappointed in the life span of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 boxes of these for our newly landscaped backyard. The first night, the lights stayed on for a couple of hours. It's been 6 weeks and now they don't even turn on anymore. All of them, not just a few. If you turn the switch on and off, they'll turn on for a couple of minutes and then turn off again. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor I Liu

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect and a great warranty
customer_reviews.text: I love these and the warranty is the BOMB !!! I had 2 lights fail after only 4-5 months and they sent me replacements in a flash! I had already purchased 2 sets and now I have a beautiful front yard. I LOVE these!! I did notice that the second set were brighter but I figured it was because the others have been out in the elements. I will be cleaning them to see if there is a difference but doesn't really matter to me, They are far enough apart that no one else notices. You will not be disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: Fawn Hill

customer_reviews.title: Impressive lights!
customer_reviews.text: I just placed my second order of these lights. I kept my expectations low, but these far exceeded what I thought they would be. They're simple lights, but give off a good amount of bright light. I wanted lights that weren't yellow or dim so you could actually see where you're walking. These were it! And you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Nice & Bright but 2 don’t light after a month.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 sets of these trusting the description and reviews. One light out in less than a week. Two out now. They are brighter than most I’ve had. The light is cool. Very easy to assemble. However, they do not hold up. Several of the globes hold water after a rain or the irrigation hits them. Already lost 2 in the first month. Won’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: RDC

customer_reviews.title: Great solar lights for dusk.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the overall appearance of the solar powered lights, the light that they provided was brighter than most solar powered lights, but the one problem is that the light does not get enough charge to last the night. The turn on at 5:30pm, but they are off by 8:30pm. They do not provide the assistance needed to aide in backing into the driveway at 10:00pm, which was the reason for the need for these lights. Maybe if a higher voltage battery was used? I like how these lights stood taller than the majority of available solar lights, which would have made it more visible
customer_reviews.author: koalapatti

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable. So much promise and little execution.
customer_reviews.text: These lights are not performing well. Have ordered two boxes this week and half are out. I turn off then on and they light up for a minute, then go off again. Very disappointed. Threw away box so don't know if can get refund. Hope the next day or two bring better results. The first box received was taped closed and was opened before and half the lights assembled. Probably had same issues. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: socalguy

customer_reviews.title: Used sold as new.
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box. Clearly this box has been opened before. It was heavily re-taped all around. Some of the interior packing materials are torn. Won't know until tomorrow morning what kind of shape the contents are in. But if it is open box, the listing should say so. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dave in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Working fine after 2 months outdoors.  Not satisfactory 8 months after outdoor exposure to moderately cold and wet NW winter.
customer_reviews.text: Units are holding up well after 2 months outdoors in mild and wet spring weather. The real test is a cold wet winter. Very good illumination. Less than 8 months after purchase two of the garden light globes are filling with water after heavy rains. The water is leaking around the perimeter of the top mounted solar cells. After drying out the lighting section I put a ring of epoxy around the outside of the square-shaped solar cells. Another problem is cold weather. I replaced the cheap NiCd battery with freshly charged nickel-metal battery. The solar cells are not fully charging the battery and the LED goes dark in less than 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Different brightness levels - looks goofy when lit
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say that these are very pretty, easy to assemble, and they work. My problem with them is that the lights have noticeably different levels of brightness (some are kind of dim compared to others in the set) even though they get equal amounts of sunlight throughout the day. Also, the coolness/warmth of the lights vary. They are all a cool color (which I'm not crazy about, but that's my own fault for not researching more) but the coolness is variable among the six of them. Between the different colors and the brightness/dimness discrepancies, they look cheap when they light up so I'll probably move them to my back yard and get something higher quality for the front.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lights - 3 More Broke Though, but Great Warranty
customer_reviews.text: These lights are overall fantastic. I purchased these a couple years ago to light up the parts of my pond and driveway. The material feels thick and the LEDs emit bright light. I love the fact that I am able to make the lights as short or as tall as I'd like. However, two have broke and I contacted the company since it has a lifetime warranty, but I have heard no response yet. At the moment I will leave this review with 3 stars. Edit 5/6/2020: Three more lights have since stopped working. I am hoping to hear from the company as I am unable to contact them because this particular product is no longer available.
customer_reviews.author: Almo

customer_reviews.title: Nice on/off feature, top pops off occassionally.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two sets of these. I did not realize they had an on and off switch, so it took a while before I figured out how to get them to come on. I have mine between the edge of the sidewalk and monkey grass. Occassionally, the top comes off and the get water inside. Happily, once the water is emptied they turn back on. They are nice and bright. They would be better if the top didn't pop off.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice pathway lights - not!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice pathway lights - they don't throw light very far, maybe a 3' circle of light; but that's all I need for our walkway. They arrived intact and all 6 work nicely. Hoping they last longer than the previous ones did in our fierce Florida sun.... On edit, 19 days later: 2 have already stopped working. Clearly, worrying about how they would fare this summer in FL is a moot point, if they can't make it more than a few weeks. Home Depot has a 6-pack of solar pathway lights on sale for $18.97 - I'm feeling like I made a big mistake with this particular Amazon purchase :-(
customer_reviews.author: D. Masselink

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights but poor quality plastic ground stakes
customer_reviews.text: We have had these lights since July 2019 and are generally pleased with them, however the plastic stakes that you attach the lights to into the ground easily break in a very short period of time and the lights generally become useless. A few of them have also had a very fast battery drain requiring replacements, but that is not my main issue. I wish the stakes that they attach to into the ground held up better. Otherwise, the lights look very nice as a border for a driveway or walkway.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Most of the lights appear to be working fine but do not beleive the "lifetime guarantee" BS on ...
customer_reviews.text: Most of the lights appear to be working fine but do not beleive the "lifetime guarantee" BS on the box. I received the lights two weeks ago and one light in the box did not work due to what appears to be a faulty on/off switch. The lifetime guarantee states that if any light fails (no time limit), they will replace the light. Simply contact them at SolarGlow.us to replace the light. When you try to get to solarglow.us. , you get only to the Amazon site to buy the lights. A little further research revealed that the lights are sold by an outfit called webdeals. Numerous e-mails to webdeals have been ignored. The "lifetime Guarantee" is therefore complete nonsense.
customer_reviews.author: DONALD J BILSKI

customer_reviews.title: Left in the dark....
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lights to provide lighting to the sidewalk at night. I was disappointed to find that the lights stay on nearly 2 hours after sunset, then go dark. I bought these to replace an existing set of solar-powered lights hoping to enhance the lighting; the old units provide all-night lighting even after 3 years, while these did not new out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoWalleyeAngler

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT. AMAZING SELLER
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two boxes of these solar lights in Oct. 2016. They were bright enough to be functional and added a charming elegance to my garden. They survived 3 harsh winters here in Michigan which is really something to consider. I took a chance of contacting the seller after they stopped working just recently because I remembered they were on a Lifetime Replacement Warranty when I bought them. To my surprise this seller responded promptly and after some more communications to clarify some details, the seller promised to send me two new boxes of these solar lights and honor their warranty. Yay. Kudos to them for a very good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Mizdi

customer_reviews.title: Terrible lights, unless you only need 2-3 hours after sunset
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible. I received them on December 22, 2016. On December 23, 2016 I opened them, made sure the battery was in each, flipped the switch to Auto and planted in the garden. They have been in the garden since. They come on at dusk like they should. However, they only remain lit for 2-3 hours, then off they go. Not just one or two of them, but all of them and I bought two sets. I can understand if one or two have a hiccup. I would never purchase them again and I still have a little bit of time to return them under Amazon return policy. If they do not start lighting all night, back they go.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Popo

customer_reviews.title: 5 SOLAR LIGHTS ONE NOT WORKING AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: One of the 5 solar lights did not work at all i was happy with them until i got one that didnt work and i changed the battery twice and still nothing can u please replace one of the solars lights make sure its,works before it leaves you right now im not gonna give any stars til my working set is complete
customer_reviews.author: melissa alexander

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed with these lights
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed with these lights. I was excited to find lights that did not require additional AA batteries to replace! They come on when the sun goes down...but they stay on for only about 2 hours. If I flip the on/off switch they come back on...but just for a short time. My other solar lights in the yard (battery-assisted) stay on through the night - so it has nothing to do with lack of sun to recharge the batteries during the day. Will the company honor their lifetime guarantee regarding this failure to perform?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You'll definitely need to replace the cheap batteries
customer_reviews.text: For the price these aren't the worst buy, but my two main issues are the batteries and hollow plastic stakes. The batteries that are included are only 600mAh, so I replaced them with Energizer 2400mAh batteries to get 4x the charge. This has helped a bit with keeping them all consistently lit. The stakes are very cheap, and I snapped one in half when inserting them all in the ground (and it did not take a lot of force at all). I was able to superglue it back on with no major harm done, but the bottom line is I would look elsewhere for outdoor solar lights.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality, stayed all day under the sun and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality, stayed all day under the sun and at night light was very low and went off after short time. Most of the solar led lights have same problem. I won't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave P

customer_reviews.title: Lights Great, box is not
customer_reviews.text: I received these quickly. The packaging was questionable but everything was there and in working order. This and another item came in a box of appropriate size and strength with protection. However the original sealed container, manufactures packaging for the lights was minimal. Everything was rather sloshed (technical term) around. I tested everything and it was fine. The lights seem to be nice and bright and just what I was hoping for. If the original packaging had been better I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bob T

customer_reviews.title: They look great at the border of my planter bed and are ...
customer_reviews.text: They look great at the border of my planter bed and are bright enough. I was pleased with them when I saw them for the first time last night. The lights are also very easy to set up. I ordered another set! Update: after 2 nights, two lights were not on after 3 hours of darkness. When I woke up this morning at 6 am (it was still dark outside), none of the lights were on. This was after a full day of charging in the sun on the SW side of the house. I'm still waiting to see what "normal" is.
customer_reviews.author: Ingapone

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. The lights produce different levels of brightness. The battery charge varies by hours. Some only last until 10PM one was still on at 3AM. The solar cells on them were of a different manufacture. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: True to it's brightness is better over other solar lights
customer_reviews.text: True to it's brightness is better over other solar lights. Easy to set up. I have one that doesn't always light. I'll try new batteries first but if it still doesn't stay on, the company says it will replace it so if that is the case, I would definitely recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: DragonflyPrincess

customer_reviews.title: Awful performance!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. We had purchased some very inexpensive solar powered garden lights locally and they perform 100% better. The SolarGlow lights hardly ever light and don't stay on for any length of time if they do light and the cheap lights we bought here in town are first to light and stay on all night. I would never recommend these. I wish we could return them, but we threw the packaging away!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Lights Ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are terrific! Easy to assemble and ready to use. Really look bright and last long into the night. They come with rechargeable batteries, set to go with a flip of the switch to ON. Plastic, but sturdy and the height is adjustable. With a lifetime guarantee and a fair price, this is a highly recommended light. In addition, the company is a delight to deal with. Friendly follow through after my purchase and a no hassle replacement for a light that had a slight problem. Everything was customer centered and uncomplicated. I intend to be a lifetime customer and wish this company much success!
customer_reviews.author: Linda P.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, do not stay lit consistantley
customer_reviews.text: Poor Quality, do not stay lit consistantley. one night on 2 nights off
customer_reviews.author: eb102

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy go to Walmart next time!
customer_reviews.text: These are kind of cheap a couple of them broke when I was putting them in the ground... now they don’t even work very frustrating when you have some on some off and they’ve been out in the sun forever cheaply made for the price and nobody will even get back in touch with you from the company don’t order these. I have my yard all nice and I was so excited to have my lights out there some on some not. I don’t know what to do with the battery it’s just cheaply be very disappointed Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly J.

customer_reviews.title: Performed as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The lights were easy to install and are performing as advertised. Customer service communications has been excellent as we identified the duration of being on. Initially time was shorter than expected. With the level of sun shine, we switched the lights to off for two days then back on, allowing for a full battery charge. They have remained brighter (15 lumen) and on longer. Pleased with the results! Updated. One of the lights failed to operate. We contacted customer service and they went through a brief checklist and then sent the replacements. This all happened within a few days, without hassle. We are very pleased with the response.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the lights so far
customer_reviews.text: I love the lights so far, extremely easy to put together and install and have them running now for three nights without any problems. What I like most about your lights is that you will stand by your guarantee from what I've read in Amazon. After using the lights for a few months a couple did not stay on for more then a few hours so I emailed the company and they sent me a complete new set of lights and it only took 2 days to get them. This is a truly remarkable company that takes customer satisfaction to heart with outstanding service. I can't think of a more reputable company that I have ever dealt with.
customer_reviews.author: sk

customer_reviews.title: running about 7 hrs and could not be more impressed with the amount of light.
customer_reviews.text: These lights are on the east side of the house so they get full sun 1/2 of the day. Still run a min of 7 hrs and very bright. Nothing like the old lights they replaced.
customer_reviews.author: J. stalnaker

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple problems with the lights that currently have. 1. Three of the solar panels have cracks. 2. One of the lights does not work at all. 3. The plastic protecting the solar panels has already begun to "fog up" so I am sure that does not help the daytime charging. Yes it does have a lifetime warranty, but atleast the initial products I recieve should be somewhat useable.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Very Disapointed!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed and a waste of time!! We have made sure these lights were in the right location for full sun (and we live in the desert). We made sure the batteries were positioned properly and everything was turned on correctly. (Not a lot of moving parts here ). However, they only stay on about 2-3 hours. Either the product is terrible or the batteries are almost dead. (we've only had them for 5 days). I sent a msg to the company, as they are supposed to be life time guarantee, but I have not received a response. So they are getting returned to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: they don't stay on as long as I would like
customer_reviews.text: I like these lights, they were easy to put together and setup. my only complaint is that when these turn on at night they only last for about 3-4 hrs on before turning off, some of them turn off only about after 2hrs. they look great when they are all on though. wish it would last a bit longer. I tested and made sure that one was getting sun all day long then at night it lasted about 4hrs. I'm only docking it 1 star though cause I knew going in that this might be an issue. I have not had any set of solar lights I have bought before not have a similar issue.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Sadly just a poorly made product
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I was looking for and needing for an outdoor walkway. I purchased 3 sets of them. They lasted maybe a month or 2 working ok. The okay part was giving me maybe 3hours of light. Now hardly any of them turn on and never last longer than 90minutes. They received plenty of sun during the day (Texas Summer heat and light) but never once stayed on past midnight with a sunset of 9pm. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: T Barn

customer_reviews.title: Meh.....ok.
customer_reviews.text: They are decent lights I guess, but I was looking for exceptional. They're just average at best. I definitely wouldn't call them "Super Bright" as the description claims. In fact the brightness (or lack thereof) was a big disappointment. In addition, one of the lights doesn't work and had a broken lens. Probably wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: All but 2 of the lights are dead after just 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because of all the positive reviews and the great price. I should have know better. The lights worked great and were very bright, but that means nothing if they are going to stop working after only a few months. I tried replacing the rechargeable batteries but that did not work. The only thing that works is moving the build around a bit then it will turn on. Then it goes off again after a few minutes. I guess there is loose wiring inside the case. Since they all failed except for 2 of the, I assume this is a manufacturing problem. Don't buy these unless you only need them for a short time.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Bright lights, but unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I spent more than I would ordinarily spend for garden lights because I needed brighter lights for a dark side yard. The lights are indeed bright. However one is already not working. At this price, I expect reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Hunakai

customer_reviews.title: Eh....
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic, required batteries in addition to being solar hence the lower rating. They are LED and aren’t very bright so make sure you get several packages if you’re looking to actually use them to see at night. If anything hits them or falls on them (in our case a coconut) they will shatter.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Renee

customer_reviews.title: All have stopped working after 2-3 mos.  Would NOT buy!!
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty cheap construction and not too bright. I admit it, I fell for the "lifetime guaranty", I'll probably never reach that point as I don't think I would want to keep them forever. Updated: All of them have stopped working pretty much. There is a reason they have a lifetime warranty. I don’t want them replaced, that’s how cheap they are/feel. I would not recommend these at all....
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality lights
customer_reviews.text: These lights work however the batteries they come with are cheap. Once I changed them out with decent rechargeable AA batteries, the light was brighter and lasted longer. Of the 12 that I purchased, 4 of them collect rain water inside the clear light lens every time it rains. It's just a matter of time before the internals rust out.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Love our lights
customer_reviews.text: My husband drilled a hole on top of the landscaping posts he put up and used just the top part of the light and they look amazing. We bought 12 but only put up 6 so far. Unfortunately we have a street light right above where we have them but they still give off a nice light. Can't wait until we put the others ones up. I attached a picture but it doesn't do it justice. Once we finish our landscaping in the back we plan to get more. Definitely recommend buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: first order came in. Lights would sometimes go on ...
customer_reviews.text: first order came in. Lights would sometimes go on but would not stay on more than 2hrs. Vendor sent out another shipment free. Same thing. the lights don't always come on and when they do they don't stay on for more than 2 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: VERY VERY VERY CHEAP CRAP LIGHTS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Complete crap! Only one light outta six still works after a week! Other than that it's fine! UPDATE: The one that was working stopped working as well. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is a Priority!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a set of these garden lights and found the company to be very customer service oriented. They followed up to be sure we received the order on time, asked if there were any questions or concerns. After setting them up, they worked just fine and were very attractive. However on moving one to slightly adjust its proximity to the path, the bottom piece of the stem cracked. I wrote back to the company and they IMMEDIATELY sent replacements and again followed up to be sure they arrived and that we were fully satisfied. A GREAT product and a GREAT company.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Crawford

customer_reviews.title: They are not very good. Only stay lit for about 3 hours if ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set which I am just about to return. They are not very good. Only stay lit for about 3 hours if you are lucky. I live in Florida so plenty of sun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Britlin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased these and they have been in direct sunlight for two days and still don't light up at night. Can't figure out how to contact the company in regards to the life time guarantee-disappointed
customer_reviews.author: atthebeach9

customer_reviews.title: To my surprise and delight I received a complete set of 6 not just ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these solar lights two years ago. Two of the lights decided that they didn't want to light. I contacted the company regarding this problem, since the lights come with a lifetime warranty. I explained that I had changed the batteries, waited for them to charge but the lights just didn't want to light. They said they would ship me the replacements that I needed. To my surprise and delight I received a complete set of 6 not just two lights. In this day and age, it is wonderful to deal with a company that really stands behind their warranty and product.
customer_reviews.author: Castle's Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Dead in an hour
customer_reviews.text: The first night I got these I thought they were really cute despite the fact that they don't throw off that much light. They lasted 5 hours or so for the first two nights only. I've had them now for 2 weeks in multiple weather conditions and they just do not last. I can have a perfect sunshiny day and I still will have them off in less than 2 hours. Very disappointing considering the price. It could be poor batteries but that is the majority of the expense here since the lights themselves are very chinsy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Warner

customer_reviews.title: please don't buy/no warranty
customer_reviews.text: they worked about a month and every month there would be another on quit, and then another and now only two work. my main complaint is the company have no phone available and you can only contact them on the email link on their website...4-5 time I've sent complaints they have gone unanswered. there are numerous complaints in the reviews about people complaining of the same thing...Warranty is useless
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: i love the look of the lights but they don't stay ...
customer_reviews.text: i love the look of the lights but they don't stay charged long. i'm going to presume that's because of where my house is facing in relation to sunlight (i don't think they get enough during the day). i do live around other people who experience what i do yet their lights seem to work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service  & Warranty
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for over a year now and had a few go out this spring after a long winter in the midwest. I bought these because of the Lifetime warranty and they exceeded my expectations, I emailed them a request to replace 2 dead lights on 4/26 and they sent me a whole new set of six on 4/30, Cindy did a outstanding job in their customer service department. Make sure you have your amazon order# when you request the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Doug P

customer_reviews.title: Was very excited to receive these and very disappointed in the result
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited to receive these and very disappointed in the result. After having them outside for two weeks, only 3 of the 6 light up. It may be that the batteries that came with them are dead, but still--this is not what I wanted. The light is very dull and very white or bluish. Light does not look anything like the glow on the box. I'm returning the second box that I purchased. Choose another kind.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy T. Ellett

customer_reviews.title: Good Morning and thank you for your interest and concern
customer_reviews.text: Good Morning and thank you for your interest and concern. We received the garden lights within a couple of days and all the packaging was in great shape. My husband unpacked and checked everything and all seems to be fine. It was another 30 degree day in northern California but no rain for a change. Our yard is a disaster from this long unusual rainy season this year. So, our new lights will not be used for at least another month. Then we can get outside and spruce things up in our very damaged, frozen, drowned yard. Sincerely, Gloria Salander (Richard)
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Affordable/bright solar path lighting
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these lights at the beginning of the summer and they have held up well. Needed lights for a garden path. Very easy setup within 10 minutes I had them together and they worked immediately right out of the box. Only issue is some of the solar panels have warped under the heat of the sun. Warranty covered the ones that had issues, easily and quickly replaced by manufacturer. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MJF

customer_reviews.title: they work better. These are cheaper made and don't shine as ...
customer_reviews.text: The box was banged up when it arrived. More than one of the tiny led light bulbs was bent or out of the socket. The quality seemed cheap. I didn't get much light from them either. Two lights wouldn't work every night until I'd fiddle with them. I'm sending them back. I put my landscape lights with wiring back in. For me, they work better. These are cheaper made and don't shine as bright.
customer_reviews.author: TH9500

customer_reviews.title: Buy with confidence
customer_reviews.text: So far so good and we are pleased with the performance and quality of these lights. We had many sunless rainy days in Texas shortly after putting the lights outside ( due to the hurricane) but once the sun came out they started to put out a nice bright light. Easy to assemble and good packaging. Excellent customer service and follow-up. A life time warranty gives me confidence this is a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: never heard back how to replace the original 2 that didn’t work. Now all BUT 2 work. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 4-15-17. All are working good except 2. I was a bit freaked out when we came home one night and the light hit them and they went off. But that just shows their sensiti. I would like to utilize the "lifetime " guarantee and get the two replaced but don't see where I can do that.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up . Bright lights. I’m giving 5 stars as the company kept their commitment to replace a defective light. I contacted them regarding 1 light that went dead after a month of using. Immediately they sent a whole box replacement ! So if you are hesitating , I suggest go ahead ..you have nothing to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: These work "ok" for about 3 hours and then they start to go dim. One of the 6 only worked for 2 days and now wont work at all. It appears to have a short in the switch that turns them on. If I wiggle the switch it comes on but then fades within a few seconds and wont come on again. So basically 5 out of 6 work for a few hours and one not at all. Very disappointed in these.... Have other solar lights that last all night in the same area so I know these get full sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Ag4x4

customer_reviews.title: gets plenty of sun time... does not hold a charge.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for the backyard that gets a lot of sun. They look awesome when they work. However, the charge never holds up longer than an hour, hour and a half tops at night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Erroneous first review
customer_reviews.text: This is my second review so I can rectify the error I made in my first review. My apologies. I had found 12 stems that looked exactly alike. The diagram on the box did not show a connecting part that should be inserted into the stems. It was only later on that I found the small connecting parts, packed into the bottom of the box. So there are no missing parts. I have just set up the lights and do not know how they will work. I will review again after a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I received my solarglow lights Saturday. Sunday I unpacked and inspected them. They were very well packaged and there was no damage. As I turned the switch on I covered the solar panel and they all worked which tells me they were all tested. I placed the lights around my walkway and they all came on at dark. I'm very happy with the quality and with a lifetime replacement guarantee, how can you lose?
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: warranty
customer_reviews.text: So far I have had no problems with this set of lights. I did order new batteries for backup purposes. I like the fact that if there is an issue, the company will replace the lights (lifetime warranty).
customer_reviews.author: L. Elinger

customer_reviews.title: Eventually they stop working
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The solar panels faded in less than a year and slowly stop working with less and less brightness until now I have 6 that are broken. Supposed lifetime warranty but how/where to file a claim???
customer_reviews.author: no pen name

customer_reviews.title: I was excited to have these solar lights and all of them worked very nicely in the beginning -- very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I want to give ZERO star for this product. 0/6 light works in a week. I was excited to have these solar lights and all of them worked very nicely in the beginning -- very pleased. However, in 3 days, 3/6 lights worked only when I snaked them and it lasted only couple of minutes. Then, there is no light, working right now. I ordered one more pack for my backyard -- dud not open yet. Will check whether I can return. strong recommendation NOT to BUY this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dong Lee

customer_reviews.title: High Hopes Didn't Measure Up!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these lights because of the good reviews. I received 2 sets and 2 of the lights didn't work. A couple of days later another one was getting very dim. After that 2 more wouldn't stay on past 3 hours. The seller sent replacement ones for the 1st 3 I had problems with. It just seemed every few days something was happening to a different one. It's really a shame, because I really loved these and they looked really great. They gave off really good light as well. Because of all these problems within the first 2 - 3 weeks, I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: LLB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and easy to install. However and this has nothing to do with the beauty and functionality of these little lights- if you mix them with the older variety, the light is,a different color. Its not unpleasant its just not the same color.
customer_reviews.author: JILL

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: These just aren't doing a great job at our house. Some of them light up fantastic, some barely/rarely light up (even though they're feet away from the others). If you're looking to light a walkway evenly, these aren't the best. For the price, they're hard to pass up, but we'll likely remove these and "try again" with another product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Y.

customer_reviews.title: Please, don't spend your money on these lights.
customer_reviews.text: I Bought (2) sets of lights. (12 total) Nine lights worked and 3 did not. 25% Out of Box Failure Rate is pretty bad. Don't bother with these lights.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: 100% Failing Rate - All Failed Not Even One Lights Up After 3 Full Day Under Full California Sun!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product I purchased on Amazon, very disappointed, NONE of these 6 lights works! I have put them under FULL California sun for 3 days and still NOT EVEN one lights up! When opening the box I noticed the items appear to be very low quality and cheaply made, but never expect to find 100% failure rate! So I'm now convinced that all these 5-star reviews are FAKE!
customer_reviews.author: KCUTBOY

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on prime day and they arrived in 15 hours. Very lightweight and they work great. I set them up in the yard with only a few hours of sunlight left in the day and they stayed lit all night. They sit about a foot off the ground but because of the (extremely simple) way you construct them, they could easily sit only 6 inches off the ground if you prefer a shorter profile. Only had them a couple days, but great value so far!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product of its kind that I have found. We needed some way to identify our driveway on a dark street surrounded by large trees. These lights, if they live up to their advertising and their performance so far, will be the answer to our problem. One piece of the packaging was left out, but the vendor and Amazon quickly resolved the problem. Outstanding customer service all the way around. I do not hesitate to recommend these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Howard C.

customer_reviews.title: These were easy to assemble and they look nice
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to assemble and they look nice. I have two issues though. I expected the light to be more of a white light, and they are very bluish. The light is not as bright compared to some of the other reviewes. I wanted them to shine bright enough to light up my bushes. I have only had them two nights and it has been somewhat cloudy out so I am hoping that's why they are not as bright.
customer_reviews.author: yeskirkland

customer_reviews.title: either switch is bad or bulb is no good new batteries do not ...
customer_reviews.text: supposed to be lifetime replacement. cannot contact this vendor. to this point four lights will not glow at all. either switch is bad or bulb is no good new batteries do not fix this issue. I should have the right to have this vendor replace faulty product as advertised but it is impossible to contact them for replacement. I also bought a set for my son and several of his lights are failing and not glowing anymore either! please advise as to how to solve this issue with the vendor. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Stone

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: After more than 1 year of use, these lights stopped working. They are too dim and not bright enough. After they turn on, they only stay on for few hours. I am throwing them out and installing LED powered and wired lights. They are easy to install and look good but they are not functional.
customer_reviews.author: Pankaj Patel

customer_reviews.title: Good qualify for my money.....maybe I received a bad batch
customer_reviews.text: Only three of the lights worked we tried everything to get them to work..but they look real nice in the yard..one of the light bulbs inside of the light was attached..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service and product!
customer_reviews.text: One out of the six didn't work, even after replacing the battery. I emailed SolarGlow and they emailed me back immediately letting me know they were sending me out another box since they don't have any singles! That is excellent customer service! Thanks Cindy at Solar Glow!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D. Francis

customer_reviews.title: Love the new solar lights
customer_reviews.text: Love the new solar lights! I ordered two sets initially and was so impressed that I ordered a third set. They were easy to install. They are a very bright white light. They don’t come on as early as my old set (yellow hue 6 year old set) but I can live with that because they are so bright.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: How good can a $5 solar light be
customer_reviews.text: I installed these less than two weeks ago at our cabin. Every night, at least 4 of the 6 need to be switched off then on again in order to work. We bought them for their simple, contemporary design. It is impossible to find solar lights with a metal housing that are not ugly carriage-lamp style. These are cheap plastic throughout. It is my own fault for falling for the sales hype. How good can a $5 solar light be? Not very good is the answer.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Love these solar lights just wish they were metal & ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these solar lights just wish they were metal & not plastic. One of my connector pieces arrived with a crack in the plastic. Now I have to prop the light up against something otherwise it falls over. Puts out a pretty bluish light once dark.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Different lighting color/brightness
customer_reviews.text: These light up fine, we are just bummed because half of them shine whiter than the other half. So, we’ve had to place them, every other one, in our flower bed so that you don’t notice too much that half of them are different in color. Not sure how it worked out that way, but it is disappointing and we are now having to look into alternatives for our landscape lighting. Too bad they couldn’t all shine the same way!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Terrible run time
customer_reviews.text: Terrible run time. We keep them outdoors here in the desert SW with endless sunlight all day. But, when the sun goes down and these turn on, they stay on for 30 minutes at the most. Maybe the rechargeable AA that come them are garbage but I'm definitely not satisfied. I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John

product_meta.title: SolarGlow Solar Garden Lights - Super-Bright 15 Lumens - Perfect Neutral Design; Makes Garden Pathways & Flower Beds Look Great - Easy NO-WIRE Installation; All-Weather/Water-Resistant
feature_bullets: SIX (6) LIGHTS COVER YOUR PATH! Bright clear light shines forth from each LED light. Position them on your path for the ultimate in beauty AND safety!
NO-HASSLE INSTALLATION! Simple, EASY installation out of the box! There’s NO HASSLE because there are NO WIRES! Runs completely on solar power. Turns on at dark, off at dawn!
100% SOLAR-POWERED! Save money on electricity when you use the sun. Plus... the batteries RECHARGE THEMSELVES through the day!
WEATHER-RESISTANT! No worries about rain, snow, frost, or sleet. Rugged ABS plastic construction gives the longest-lasting life of any LED lights on the market! Made tough and sealed tight!
100% LIFETIME REPLACEMENT GUARANTEE! Simply contact us if you ever have issues with your SolarGlow lights & we'll rush replacements at no charge FOR LIFE!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars2,967 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
